summary: Documentary about deceased photojournalist Tim Hetherington directed by Sebastian Junger. Together with his friend and long-term collaborator Sebastian, Tim had travelled the world ... See full summary »
cast: Chris Anderson|Peter Bouckaert|James Brabazon|Guillermo Cervera|Alistair Hetherington|Tim Hetherington|Victoria Hetherington|Idil Ibrahim|Sebastian Junger|Andre Liohn|Jason Mace|Daniel Meadows|Katie Orlinsky|Dante Paradiso|Marcus Rose
title: Tim Hetherington. Un fotógrafo en la línea de fuego
